description.translate: Even at your birth, your will burned with an irresistible intensity.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5L'ardeur indomptable\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Jà à ta naissance, ta volonté brûla\"}","{\"text\":\"§7d'une irrésistible intensité.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Even at your birth, your will burned\"}","{\"text\":\"§7with an irresistible intensity.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a3 §7SPD§a2 §7HAS§c-1 §7DAR§c-1\"}"]}}
